inclusion.criterion: Post-menopausal women aged 50-75 years at Visit 1
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability and willingness to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of 5 or more vertebral fractures
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of significant cardiac disease as determined by history, physical examination and laboratory screens
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 35-year-old woman with myasthenia gravis. She has symptoms that interfere with her job.
